actions.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Soto.

description: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to direct the Secretary, to the maximum extent practicable, to endeavor to provide information to all adjoining residential property stakeholders, next to property which the Army Corps of Engineers holds an interest.
purpose: An amendment numbered 51 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to direct the Secretary, to the maximum extent practicable, to endeavor to provide information to all adjoining residential property stakeholders, next to property which the Army Corps of Engineers holds an interest.
